basic_information.scholarship_name: Amy Reynolds-Reed Endowed Scholarship for Dance

description: This scholarship was established in 2016 to benefit a student in the CFAD Dance Department. Eligibility Dance major Full-time undergraduate Sophomore, junior, or senior Minimum 3.0 GPA Provide personal statement of 1 page, describing how receiving this scholarship will impact the student's educational goals. Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
